author: admin
title: NIELIT Recruitment 2017 (60 DEO, Engg, Manager) Jobs Apply @www.nielit.gov.in

organizations.name: national institute of electronics and information technology

text: Rs. 12250/- Process Of Selection : Selection of candidate should be done on the basis of performance in written test or interview that will be conducted by the recruitment panel of the organization. Applicants need to qualify in all the rounds to get final selection. Get Details How to Prepare for Written Exam Steps To Fill NIELIT Application Form : Firstly, visit to the official website of the National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology that is “www.nielit.gov.in/chandigarh”. Now press on “Recruitment” tab that is in menu bar of the homepage. For Online Applications are invited for different posts on contract basis in Punjab, Haryana and Chandigarh post Hit on “Advertisement” that is available under the post. PDF will appear, read the advertisement carefully and ensure your eligibility. Now go back to the previous page and press on “Apply Online” link. Fill Online Application Form with correct details in prescribed manner. Upload the scanned copies of testimonials and certificates along with the application form. Now submit the application form and take a print out for further usage.
